articles.title: Arizona man dies after self-medicating with chloroquine to treat coronavirus - CNN
articles.description: A Phoenix-area man is dead and his wife is under critical care after the two took chloroquine phosphate in an apparent attempt to self-medicate for the novel coronavirus, according to hospital system Banner Health.

articles.title: Care home nurse tells of terrifying and sudden ways coronavirus struck her patients - CNN
articles.description: A nurse from the Life Care Center in Kirkland, Washington, tells of the war-like struggle as it became the epicenter of the first coronavirus outbreak inside the US. "There's lots of casualties and ... you can't see the enemy," Chelsey Earnest said.
articles.content:
